name: Commando 94
overview: The original version left us wanting, specifically wanting the other 5 levels of play we enjoyed on the Coin-Op favorite. We also wanted a glitch free run. And while Commando 94 didn't give us all our heart's desires it did significantly better than the original 1985\1986 versions and infinitely better than the Space Invasion versions that German put out to be less violent by having us shoot silver cyborgs instead of enemy forces.
